nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member mixedLayerDepth is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the temPlate analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_Tthreshold
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if MLDs are calculated using a critical temperature threshold

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_Dthreshold
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if MLDs are calculated using a critical density threshold

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_crit_temp_threshold
nml_option.description: temperature change relative to surface for threshold method
nml_option.possible_values: all real positive values, suggested range 0.2 less than or equal to thresh less than or equal to 1

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_crit_dens_threshold
nml_option.description: potential density change relative to surface for threshold method
nml_option.possible_values: suggested range 0.01 less than or equal to thresh less than or equal to 0.5

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_reference_pressure
nml_option.possible_values: any positive real, suggested range .25E5 less than or equal to value less than or equal to 2E5

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_Tgradient
nml_option.description: Logical flag controlling whether or not to compute MLDs via the temperature gradient

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_Dgradient
nml_option.description: Logical flag controlling whether or not to compute MLDs via the density gradient

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_temp_gradient_threshold
nml_option.description: temp gradient crit value, if not exceeded max gradient used

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_den_gradient_threshold
nml_option.description: potential density gradient crit value. If not exceeded max gradient used

nml_option.name: config_AM_mixedLayerDepths_interp_method
nml_option.description: flag specifying which interpolation method to use in computations

var.name: tGradMLD
var.description: mixed layer depth based on gradient of temperature

var.name: dGradMLD
var.description: mixed layer depth based on gradient of density
